definition: to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over

sentences.english: As he looked out, a fantastic smell came to his nose.

sentences.english: As long as you get closer to the nose longans , a faint scent came on smelling.
